name: Mow
body:
# Music On Web
A music sharer

## Run
Just run

    make all


And then

    ./ghost <filename>

## Author
Vincent Hourdel <vinz_@smoothirc.net>  
David Baumgartner <ch.davidbaumgartner@gmail.com>
